this game is fun and i recommend playing it, but as i climbed ranks i found that it was getting annoying when i would have teammates that arent meant to be at the rank im in and losing games because of trolls and winning 10 games in a row and not ranking up is not ok. Cheats for the game are free and work long without detection.
Many maps. Good teambase gameplay and strategy. A skillful game.

i love the game and all but the reconnecting is trash because my computer crashed and i tryed to reconnect and it would keep saying it failed and then i got a cooldown for the terrible system and i think wth the new update it would be better
cs1.5  1.6承包了我一整个童年，csgu无异是我最爱的一款第一视角游戏，给1.51.6后画风突变让人爱不释手！

Pretty decent FPS, really easy to get into however the learning curve is fairly steep. Lower ranks of ranked gameplay is almost too toxic to play.

worst game ever. full of toxic people kick you if you are on top of leader board. i do not reccomend at all makes me sick to my stomach about how toxic the people are. its disgusting and needs to be fixed right away. i uninstalled after being kicked 6 times when i was on top of the leader board. smh.

After countless hours of playing it as a fob boy through middle and highschool I found out that I've wasted 3K+ hours on my life on this piece of garbage. The players in the game still does a great job at making me horny and aroused tho so thats a +++, especially the male gamers, theyre good at teasing my ears and know when to make me blow a quicky with them headshots. Nevertheless its aight.
Só os trolls, nota 10, fui expulso da faculdade por conta desse jogo. Obrigado, continuo jogando, 8 mil horas, 5 anos, e Ouro 3.

Oyunda çok fazla nişan ve görüş hilesi var verdiğim paraya yazıklar olsun. Büyük bir iştah ve keyifle bir CS keyfi yaşayıp alayım diyen arkadaşlarım bu yazdıklarımı görürse eğer onlarada bir çift lafım var. "BÜYÜK PİŞMANLIK" iyi günler.
Oyun içerisinde hile kullanan kişi sayısı çok fazla. Bir an önce yasaklama gelmesi gerekli.
this is a great game if you need competition.
